metadata.title: CVE-2024-36009 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ax25:Fix netdev refcount issue The dev_tracker is added to ax25_cb inax25_bind(). When the ax25 device is detaching, the dev_tracker of ax25_cbshould be deallocated in ax25_kill_by_device() instead of the dev_trackerof ax25_dev.
